events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15778](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15778.html) ([wallet] Move maxtxfee from node to wallet by jnewbery)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
utACK except for the part defining interfaces for China
utACK fabd4135c484066c06cb74075f918275b71a7e9e modulo political content discovered by @instagibbs

verification.payload:
tree 43687e358ed7d12009f567c9454ffd7e5045d654
parent bb68abe784b9fd49bddf38105d142a31ef0f9e77
author MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1555012386 -0400
committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1555341616 -0400

doc: Clarify RPC versioning

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,6 +5,18 @@ The headless daemon `bitcoind` has the JSON-RPC API enabled by default, the GUI
 option. In the GUI it is possible to execute RPC methods in the Debug Console
 Dialog.
 
+## Versioning
+
+The RPC interface might change from one major version of Bitcoin Core to the
+next. This makes the PRC interface implicitly versioned on the major version.
